@DannyPAnderson great convo. You need more Marxist's.
@pashulman @mxmcadam @SarahEBond Exactly! Best situation you never notice it. For podcasts, it doesn't mean tons of $, just good practices
@pashulman @mxmcadam @SarahEBond no prob! Spent a decade making (some terrible) things sound good.
@pashulman @ClassicsConfide use a simple (high-quality) field recorder so, not straight into a PC. Edits in GB. @mxmcadam @SarahEBond
@pashulman @mxmcadam @SarahEBond ...is key. Then U can balance vols & eq out messiness. Better software =more options, not always necessary.
@pashulman @mxmcadam @SarahEBond lots of options, but min 2 mins through midi convert into GarageBand or better. Recording 2 lines.. 1/2
@pashulman @mxmcadam @SarahEBond having worked in live sound, $ < time. Poor edit & sound quality plague podcasts.
@pashulman @mxmcadam @SarahEBond worth looking at New Books Network https://t.co/3oDzXcAFxa
